ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onload()
self.createButton({click_function = "removeUsedMarkers", function_owner = self, label = "X", position = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, scale = {1.8, 1.8, 1.8}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400, color = {0,0,0,0}, tooltip = "Remove Used Markers"})
end

function removeUsedMarkers()
  for _,obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
           if string.lower(obj.getName()) == "used" then
               obj.destruct()
           end
         end
       end

function spawn1() --used
  pos = self.getPosition()
  spawnparams = {
    type = 'Custom_Tile',
    position          = {pos.x-3,pos.y+1,pos.z},
    rotation          = {0,180,0},
    scale             = {x=0.5, y=1, z=0.5},
  }
  object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
  params = {
    image = "https://i.imgur.com/kxD7CdS.png",
    image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/2A7ipod.png",
    type = 3,
    thickness = 0.1,
  }
  object.setCustomObject(params)
  object.setName("Used")
end
